title: Awesome List Updates on May 08, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on May 08, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev
items.content_text:
### Tools / Software / Generative Art

*   Modeling
    *   üìö [Dream Fusion](https://dreamfusion3d.github.io/) - Text-to-3D using 2D diffusion.
    *   üìö [GET3D](https://nv-tlabs.github.io/GET3D/) - Generative model of 3D shapes from images by *NVIDIA*. \[[Source (‚≠ê4.4k)](https://github.com/nv-tlabs/GET3D)]
    *   üìö [Magic3D](https://research.nvidia.com/labs/dir/magic3d/) - High-resolution text-to-3D content creation.
    *   üìö [NeRF](https://www.matthewtancik.com/nerf) - View synthesis of scenes as neural radiance fields. \[[Source (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/bmild/nerf)]
    *   üìö [Shap-e (‚≠ê12k)](https://github.com/openai/shap-e) - Generate 3D objects conditioned on text or images.
items.content_html:
Tools / Software / Generative Art

  • Modeling
    • üìö Dream Fusion - Text-to-3D using 2D diffusion.
    • üìö GET3D - Generative model of 3D shapes from images by NVIDIA. [Source (‚≠ê4.4k)]
    • üìö Magic3D - High-resolution text-to-3D content creation.
    • üìö NeRF - View synthesis of scenes as neural radiance fields. [Source (‚≠ê10k)]
    • üìö Shap-e (‚≠ê12k) - Generate 3D objects conditioned on text or images.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Large Language Models (LLMs)

*   [Search-in-the-Chain: Towards Accurate, Credible and Traceable Large Language Models for Knowledge-intensive Tasks | arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.14732): "a novel framework called Search-in-the-Chain (SearChain) to improve the accuracy, credibility and traceability of LLM-generated content for multi-hop question answering"
items.content_html:
Large Language Models (LLMs)

  • Search-in-the-Chain: Towards Accurate, Credible and Traceable Large Language Models for Knowledge-intensive Tasks | arxiv: "a novel framework called Search-in-the-Chain (SearChain) to improve the accuracy, credibility and traceability of LLM-generated content for multi-hop question answering"

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

*   [echasnovski/mini.nvim#colorschemes (‚≠ê7.5k)](https://github.com/echasnovski/mini.nvim#plugin-colorschemes) - Color schemes included in `mini.nvim` plugin. All of them prioritize high contrast ratio for reading text and computing palettes in perceptually uniform color spaces.

### Colorscheme Creation / Diagnostics

*   [echasnovski/mini.nvim#mini.hues (‚≠ê7.5k)](https://github.com/echasnovski/mini.nvim/blob/main/readmes/mini-hues.md) - Module of `mini.nvim` to generate configurable color scheme. Takes only background and foreground colors as required arguments. Can adjust number of hues for non-base colors, saturation, accent color, plugin integration.
items.content_html:
Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

  • echasnovski/mini.nvim#colorschemes (‚≠ê7.5k) - Color schemes included in mini.nvim plugin. All of them prioritize high contrast ratio for reading text and computing palettes in perceptually uniform color spaces.

Colorscheme Creation / Diagnostics

  • echasnovski/mini.nvim#mini.hues (‚≠ê7.5k) - Module of mini.nvim to generate configurable color scheme. Takes only background and foreground colors as required arguments. Can adjust number of hues for non-base colors, saturation, accent color, plugin integration.

items.title: Awesome Langchain
items.content_text:
### Tools / Agents

*   [RasaGPT (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/paulpierre/RasaGPT): RasaGPT is the first headless LLM chatbot platform built on top of Rasa and Langchain. ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/paulpierre/RasaGPT?style=social)

### Open Source Projects / Other / Chatbots

*   [Langchain Chat (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/zahidkhawaja/langchain-chat-nextjs): another Next.js frontend for LangChain Chat. ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/zahidkhawaja/langchain-chat-nextjs?style=social)
*   [Langchain Chat Websocket (‚≠ê96)](https://github.com/pors/langchain-chat-websockets): About LangChain LLM chat with streaming response over websockets ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/pors/langchain-chat-websockets?style=social)
*   [langchain\_yt\_tools (‚≠ê71)](https://github.com/venuv/langchain_yt_tools): Langchain tools to search/extract/transcribe text transcripts of Youtube videos ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/venuv/langchain_yt_tools?style=social)
items.content_html:
Tools / Agents

  • RasaGPT (‚≠ê2.4k): RasaGPT is the first headless LLM chatbot platform built on top of Rasa and Langchain.

Open Source Projects / Other / Chatbots

  • Langchain Chat (‚≠ê1k): another Next.js frontend for LangChain Chat.
  • Langchain Chat Websocket (‚≠ê96): About LangChain LLM chat with streaming response over websockets
  • langchain_yt_tools (‚≠ê71): Langchain tools to search/extract/transcribe text transcripts of Youtube videos

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Communications / Compression

*   [tamp (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/BrianPugh/tamp) - A low-memory, MicroPython-optimized, DEFLATE-inspired lossless compression library.

### Communications / Cryptography

*   [ucryptography (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/dmazzella/ucryptography) - Lightweight porting of pyca/cryptography to MicroPython based on ARM Mbed TLS.
items.content_html:
Communications / Compression

  • tamp (‚≠ê43) - A low-memory, MicroPython-optimized, DEFLATE-inspired lossless compression library.

Communications / Cryptography

  • ucryptography (‚≠ê8) - Lightweight porting of pyca/cryptography to MicroPython based on ARM Mbed TLS.
